docs.title: Geothon
docs.text: Geothon is a comprehensive guide for geographic data acquisition and processing specially for Hackathons and other GIS projects. All the geospatial operations in this doc is done in QGIS and GDAL. Also the recommended file format for geospatial data is Geojson. This documentation has step by step guide (with pictures) for essential tools and operations and it more catered to hackathons as a quick guide.

docs.title: How To Use This Site?
docs.text: If you are new to GIS and Geospatial analysis or want to revise the basics of GIS, you can begin from here.

docs.title: Creating OSM account
docs.text:
Go to OSM.org You will be greeted with the homepage of Openstreetmap

Click on the Sign Up button on the top right corner.
